caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain aliens or foreign entities.
authors: Kolkhorst, Bettencourt, Birdwell, Campbell, Creighton, Flores, Hagenbuch, Hall, Hinojosa, Adam, Hinojosa, Juan "Chuy", Huffman, King, Middleton, Parker, Schwertner, Sparks
summary: This bill prohibits individuals and entities from designated threat countries (as identified in Annual Threat Assessment reports) from purchasing real property in Texas. While China is not explicitly named, it is likely included as a designated threat country. The bill affects Chinese nationals who are not US citizens/permanent residents, except for residential homesteads. Chinese government entities and Chinese-controlled organizations are prohibited from purchasing any real property in Texas.
translation: 该法案禁止来自被指定威胁国家（根据年度威胁评估报告认定）的个人和实体在德克萨斯州购买不动产。虽然没有明确指名中国，但中国很可能被列为指定威胁国家。该法案影响非美国公民/永久居民的中国公民，但自住房产除外。中国政府实体和受中国控制的组织被禁止在德克萨斯州购买任何不动产。
